DTS:Variable.DTS:Expression: "SELECT " + (DT_WSTR, 6) @[User::id_periodo_anterior] + " as id_periodo, P.W01NPE, P.W01APE, P.W01NOM, P.W01TD, P.W01ND, P.W01FNA, 'VIGENTE SALUD' as Estado_Cuenta, V.W80CTA Cuenta, 1 as Persona_Cuenta, V.W80EFA Emisor, V.W80TCO Tipo_Comprobante, V.W80FCO Fecha_Comprobante, V.W80FNT Fecha_Vcto, V.W80NPP Id_Forma_Pago, V.W80FPA Desc_Forma_Pago, V.W80SLD Importe_Deuda, V.W80CCT D_I FROM SMPLIBD.V80FDCA V INNER JOIN SMPLIBD.M01FPER P ON V.W80NPE = P.W01NPE WHERE V.W80TCA = 'A' AND V.W80SLD > 0 AND V.W80CCT = 'I' AND V.W80FCO < " + (DT_WSTR, 8) @[User::fecha_periodo_actual] + " AND V.W80TCO NOT IN ('AJIA', 'AJIS')"
DTS:Variable.DTS:VariableValue: SELECT 0 as id_periodo, P.W01NPE, P.W01APE, P.W01NOM, P.W01TD, P.W01ND, P.W01FNA, 'VIGENTE SALUD' as Estado_Cuenta, V.W80CTA Cuenta, 1 as Persona_Cuenta, V.W80EFA Emisor, V.W80TCO Tipo_Comprobante, V.W80FCO Fecha_Comprobante, V.W80FNT Fecha_Vcto, V.W80NPP Id_Forma_Pago, V.W80FPA Desc_Forma_Pago, V.W80SLD Importe_Deuda, V.W80CCT D_I FROM SMPLIBD.V80FDCA V INNER JOIN SMPLIBD.M01FPER P ON V.W80NPE = P.W01NPE WHERE V.W80TCA = 'A' AND V.W80SLD > 0 AND V.W80CCT = 'I' AND V.W80FCO < 0 AND V.W80TCO NOT IN ('AJIA', 'AJIS')

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
declare @Periodo int declare @Periodo_Anterior int DECLARE @FECHA_PERIODO_ANTERIOR CHAR(8)
SELECT @Periodo = MAX(Id_PERIODO) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PERIODO WHERE vigente_comercial = 1 SELECT @Periodo_Anterior = Id_PERIODO_ANTERIOR FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.TRANS_PERIODO WHERE ID_PERIODO = @Periodo SET @FECHA_PERIODO_ANTERIOR = CAST(@PERIODO_ANTERIOR as CHAR(6))+'01'
DELETE FROM DEUDA_1_MES DELETE FROM TEMP_DEUDA
-- Esto me sirve para conocer la gente que adeuda más de un mes y a estas personas NO las tengo que considerar porque solamente estoy evaluando las personas que deben SOLAMENTE EL ULTIMO MES INSERT INTO TEMP_DEUDA SELECT * FROM DEUDA WHERE Fecha_Comprobante < @FECHA_PERIODO_ANTERIOR;
INSERT INTO DEUDA_1_MES SELECT * FROM [CONSULTAS_DW].[dbo].[DEUDA] D WHERE Estado_Cuenta = 'VIGENTE SALUD' AND D.ID_Persona NOT IN (Select Id_Persona from TEMP_DEUDA) ORDER BY Id_Persona
UPDATE ALTAS SET DEUDA = DEUDA.Importe_Deuda, Estado_Deuda = 'I' FROM ALTAS A INNER JOIN (SELECT D.Id_Persona, SUM(D.Importe_Deuda) Importe_Deuda FROM DEUDA_1_MES D GROUP BY D.Id_Persona) DEUDA ON A.Id_Persona = DEUDA.Id_Persona WHERE ID_Titular = 'S'

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property: SELECT 0 as id_periodo, P.W01NPE, P.W01APE, P.W01NOM, P.W01TD, P.W01ND, P.W01FNA, 'VIGENTE SALUD' as Estado_Cuenta, V.W80CTA Cuenta, 1 as Persona_Cuenta, V.W80EFA Emisor, V.W80TCO Tipo_Comprobante, V.W80FCO Fecha_Comprobante, V.W80FNT Fecha_Vcto, V.W80NPP Id_Forma_Pago, V.W80FPA Desc_Forma_Pago, V.W80SLD Importe_Deuda, V.W80CCT D_I FROM SMPLIBD.V80FDCA V INNER JOIN SMPLIBD.M01FPER P ON V.W80NPE = P.W01NPE WHERE V.W80TCA = 'A' AND V.W80SLD > 0 AND V.W80CCT = 'I' AND V.W80FCO < ? AND V.W80TCO NOT IN ('AJIA', 'AJIS')

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: Select id_periodo as id_periodo_actual ,Id_PERIODO_ANTERIOR as id_periodo_anterior, CAST(id_periodo as CHAR(6))+'01' as fecha_periodo_actual FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.TRANS_PERIODO T WHERE Id_Periodo = (Select MAX(Id_PERIODO) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PERIODO WHERE vigente_comercial = 1)

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
DELETE FROM ALTAS_HISTORIA where Id_Periodo = (select distinct(Id_Periodo) from ALTAS)
INSERT INTO ALTAS_HISTORIA SELECT [Id_Periodo] ,[Id_Persona] ,[Apellido_Persona] ,[Nombre_Persona] ,[Tipo_Doc_Persona] ,[DNI_Persona] ,[Fecha_Nac_Persona] ,[Calle_Persona] ,[Dpto_Persona] ,[Nro_Puerta_Persona] ,[Telefono_Persona] ,[Edad_Actual_Persona] ,[Segmento] ,[Id_Producto] ,[Id_Plan_Producto] ,[Planes] ,[OS_Proveniente] ,[id_cobertura] ,[de_cobertura] ,[Entidad] ,[Desc_Entidad] ,[Localidad] ,[Id_Localidad] ,[Id_Provincia] ,[Provincia] ,[Posicion] ,[Zona_Promocion] ,[Cant_Altas] ,[Id_Titular] ,[Cuenta] ,[SubCuenta] ,[Secuencia] ,[Cant_Grupo_Familiar] ,[Celular_Caracteristica_1] ,[Celular_Numero_1] ,[Celular_Caracteristica_2] ,[Celular_Numero_2] ,[Mail] ,[Carencias_1] ,[Carencias_2] ,[Carencias_3] ,[Carencias_4] ,[Id_Empresa_1] ,[Desc_Empresa_1] ,[Id_Empresa_2] ,[Desc_Empresa_2] ,[Pyme_Corp_Emp_1] ,[Pyme_Corp_Emp_2] ,[Id_GA] ,[Desc_GA] ,[Deuda] ,[Estado_Deuda] ,[id_promotor] ,[de_promotor] ,[Valor_Grilla] ,[Valor_Grilla_Prorrateado] ,[Valor_Aporte_Legal] ,[Valor_Aporte_Legal_Prorrateado] ,[Valor_Aporte_Adicional] ,[Valor_Aporte_Adicional_Prorrateado] FROM ALTAS
